metadata.title: CVE-2024-39470 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:eventfs: Fix a possible null pointer dereference in eventfs_find_events()In function eventfs_find_events,there is a potential null pointerthat may be caused by calling update_events_attr which will performsome operations on the members of the ei struct when ei is NULL.Hence,When ei->is_freed is set,return NULL directly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
